results.title: Effect of Metformin on Breast Ductal Carcinoma In Situ Proliferation in a Randomized Presurgical Trial.
results.text_hl: The median posttreatment Ki-67 LI (IQR) in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and placebo arm was, respectively, 15% (5-15) versus 5% (4-6) in @<m>DISEASE_Breast_Carcinoma_In_Situ</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000071960 @@@LCIS@@@ (P = 0.1), 12% (8-20) versus 10% (7-24) in @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Intraductal_Noninfiltrating @DISEASE_MESH:D002285 @@@DCIS@@@ (P = 0.9), and 3% (1-4) versus 3% (1-4) in @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Intraductal_Noninfiltrating @DISEASE_MESH:D002285 @@@DH@@@ (P = 0.5).

citations.NLM: DeCensi A, Puntoni M, Guerrieri-Gonzaga A, Cazzaniga M, Serrano D, Lazzeroni M, Vingiani A, Gentilini O, Petrera M, Viale G, Cuzick J, Bonanni B, Pruneri G. Effect of Metformin on Breast Ductal Carcinoma In Situ Proliferation in a Randomized Presurgical Trial. Cancer Prev Res (Phila). 2015 Oct;8(10):888-94. PMID: 26276754
